import React from 'react'; import { Button, Form, Grid, Header, Message, Segment, Icon, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import myImage from './download.jpeg'; const elementsinitial = []; var elements = []; for (var x = 0; x < 1001; x++) { elementsinitial.push(x); } for (var x = 2; x < 1001; x++) { elements[x] = "" + x + " Wishes for a happy 2021 for Cat and Jenny ðŸ‘« ðŸŽ‰ ðŸ’! "; } /*elements = [ { name: "ðŸŽ‰ William", location: "ðŸ‘« Lagos", car: "ðŸ’ Honda" }, { name: "ðŸ˜ƒ Chris", location: "ðŸ˜ï¸ Moon", car: "ðŸš˜ Tesla" }, { name: " ðŸ˜ƒ Rose", location: "ðŸ˜ï¸ Venice", car: "ðŸš˜ Pagani" }, { name: "ðŸ˜ƒ Mike", location: "ðŸ˜ï¸ Milan", car: "ðŸš˜ Rolls Royce" }, { name: "ðŸ˜ƒ Liz", location: "ðŸ˜ï¸ Beirut", car: "ðŸš˜ Mercedes" } ];*/ export default () => (
Congrats Cat and Jenny

1000 wishes for a happy 2021! );
